Description.Name: Tao Xu
Description.Details: One of two known pirates known to terrorize the Outer Rim, Tao "Tick" Xu was found in a basket on Tortuga, colored in the usual House Liao banners. Life on the coastal bandit worlds of Periphery were a constant battle for survival and he quickly found he had a penchant for destruction. It wasn't until he joined the Pirate Organization, "Blackguards of Tortuga" did Tao become acquianted with his soon-to-be lackey, "Tick", a nervous wreck of a pirate that seemed to somehow restrain Xu's wanton violence enough for him to earn a decent wage and be able to "preserve" some treasure from the remains littering the battlefield. Can Command Tanks and Pilot Mechs.
